author: kwright
msg: Fix broken SharePoint connection; expect-continue header is NOT accepted by SharePoint servers.

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1586 - Implement checkpoint support in DocumentNodeStore
Adding a separate collection named 'settings' which stores the checkpoint data. It can be later used to store other state information related to DocumentNodeStore

author: ivan
msg: Reduce buffer size used for parsing config files. There no reason to waste
100kb of memory -- 16kb is enough to avoid I/O overhead.

author: mduerig
msg: OAK-1560: Expose RevisionGCMBean for supported NodeStores

author: nick
msg: Add my signature to David's GPG key, as used in the 1.5 release
